Package Utils

Class GameEditor

java.lang.Object
Utils.GameEditor
public class GameEditor extends Object
The GameEditor class is responsible for editing and saving map information in the game. It provides methods to write the map information to a file, including the game engine data, player turns, map details, player information, and issued orders.
Author:
Yurui

      Writes the game information to a file with the given filename.
      Parameters:
      p_gameEngine - The instance of the GameEngine.
      p_filePath - The name of the file to write to.
      p_playerName - The name of the player.

    • loadPlayers

      private static List<Player> loadPlayers(BufferedReader p_reader) throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException, NoSuchMethodException, SecurityException, InstantiationException, IllegalAccessException, IllegalArgumentException, InvocationTargetException
      Loads the list of players from the specified reader.
      Parameters:
      p_reader - The reader from which to load the data.
      Returns:
      The list of loaded players.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
      ClassNotFoundException - If the player class cannot be found.
      NoSuchMethodException - If the player class lacks the required constructor.
      SecurityException - If there are security violations while reflecting on the player class.
      InstantiationException - If an instantiation error occurs while creating the player instance.
      IllegalAccessException - If access to the player class or constructor is denied.
      IllegalArgumentException - If an illegal argument is passed to the player constructor.
      InvocationTargetException - If an error occurs while invoking the player constructor.

    • parseCards

      private static HashMap<String,Integer> parseCards(String p_line)
      Parses a HashMap of card names and their counts from the specified line.
      Parameters:
      p_line - The line containing the card information.
      Returns:
      A HashMap representing the cards owned by a player.

      Loads the list of issued orders from the specified reader and writes them to a file.

      p_filePath - The path to the file where orders will be written.
